#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int lk_up1[]={1,5,4,0,5,1,2,8,9,9};
int lk_up2[]={1,7,8,4,9,5,6,2,3,3};
int main()
{
    int n,sum;
    while(cin>>n)
    {
                 sum=0;
                 up:
                 if(n<=10)
                 printf("%d\n",lk_up1[n-1]);
                 else if(n<=20)
                 printf("%d\n",(lk_up2[n-11]+9)%10);
                 else{
                      sum=((n/10)-1)*3 + 9;
                      if(n%10>0)
                      sum+=lk_up2[(n%10)-1];
                      
                      printf("%d\n",sum%10);
                      
                      }}
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
